title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, March 25, 2021
description: Author Flannery O’Connor was born on this day in 1925. A woman of strong opinions, her writing was equally fierce and frequently examined questions of morality through morally flawed characters.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
